DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: GONCALVES, P. M.;GONÇALVES, PAULO;PAULO GONÇALVES;PAULO GONÇALVES*;GONÃ§ALVES, PAULO;GONCALVES, PAULO;CONCALVES, P.;GONCALVES, P.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduação em Engenharia Mecânica-Aeronáutica pelo Instituto Tecnológico de Aeronáutica (1992), mestrado em Master of Science (M.Sc.) in Technology Policy - Massachusetts Institute of Technology Sloan School of Management (1998), mestrado em Mestrado em Planejamento Energetico pela Universidade de São Paulo (1995) e doutorado em Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) in Management - Massachusetts Institute of Technology Sloan School of Management (2003). Atualmente é professor associado - University of Lugano, pesquisador afiliado - Massachusetts Institute of Technology Sloan School of Management e diretor acadêmico - University of Lugano.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: bachelor's at Engenharia Mecânica-Aeronáutica from Instituto Tecnológico de Aeronáutica (1992), master's at Master of Science (M.Sc.) in Technology Policy from Massachusetts Institute of Technology Sloan School of Management (1998), master's at Mestrado em Planejamento Energetico from Universidade de São Paulo (1995) and doctorate at Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) in Management from Massachusetts Institute of Technology Sloan School of Management (2003). He is currently associate professor at University of Lugano, research affiliate at Massachusetts Institute of Technology Sloan School of Management and academic director at University of Lugano.
